description: When I finally arrived at the village, the fire was out and everyone was waiting silent. They saw me. The tallest one of them came to me, with a crown of black feathers on his head. He shows me a scarlet amulet, with the same shape as the one I just found. I show him what I found and his face changed from worried to a bright smile.

steps.title: I exchange the red amulet for the blue one.
